dcterms:creator: S. Fan
J. Zhu
X. Han
C. Shi
L. Hu
B. Ma
Y. Li
dcterms:description: DBLP is an academic bibliography with millions of publications. A subset of DBLP is extracted with four areas: Data Mining, Database, Natural Language Processing, and Computer Vision from the year of 2013 to 2017, including papers, terms, and authors to construct a heterogeneous graph.
dcterms:title: DBLP

dcterms:creator: P. Wang
Y. Fu
H. Xiong
X. Li
dcterms:description: IMDB dataset contains information about movies. A heterogeneous graph is constructed from three genres of movie information: Action, Comedy, and Drama, including movies, actors, directors, and tags.
dcterms:title: IMDB

dcterms:creator: P. Wang
Y. Fu
Y. Zhou
K. Liu
X. Li
K. Hua
dcterms:description: YELP is a dataset containing data of restaurant reviews. A subset is extracted containing customers, reviews, keywords, and restaurants from various types to form a restaurant review heterogeneous graph.
dcterms:title: YELP
